title: In DIRE need of Identifying two fonts
content:
I am in dire need of identifying the two fonts on the image. Both the Name Above, and the word Punkintown. The former designer was unable to provide the font names. The upper looks similar to ITC Bradley Hand, just not the exact font. The "K" in Punkintown seems almost manually created such as via Photoshop, but just not figuring it out. Help! Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [punkin font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417195453/http:/typophile.com/files/punkin%20font.png) | 87.15 KB |
author: acrenshaw

comments.content:
The upper one seems like a font that it's cloned by many known font-forgery companies like Brendel (Liliput), Fantazia Concepts (FZ HAND 6), ImageLine (Abera ttnorm), etc.  
The original is probably **Davys Crappy Writing** by D. Rakowski (1992) but I'm not 100% sure about it.

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417195453/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
